Song.title: Surrender All
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Rich Dalmas © 2004 Sovereign Grace Praise

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [F/A G F C/E Dm C | G Am | F/A G F C/E Dm C | Em | F2]
Verse 1: [C]Take all I [G]am, Lord,{,} and [Am]all that I [F2]cling to [C]You are my [G]Savior{,} I [Am]owe every[F2]thing to [F]Take all the [C/E]treasures{,} that [F]lie in my [Gsus]storehouse [F]They cannot [C/E]follow{,} when [Dm7]I enter [Gsus]Your hou[3/8]se[G]
Chorus: So [F2 C/E G/B]I [ ]sur[C]render [F2 C/E]all [ ]to [G/B]You[C] [F2 C/E G/B]I [ ]sur[C]render [F2 C/E | G2]all
Verse 2: [C]Take all my [G]cravings{,} for [Am]vain recog[F2]nition [C]Fleshly in[G]dulgence{,} and [Am]worldly amb[F2]ition [F]I want so [C]much, Lord,{,} to [F]make You the [G]focus To [F]serve You in [C/E]secret,{,} and [Dm7]never be [Gsus]noticed[3/8 G]
Verse 3: [C]Take all my [G/C]hunger,{,} for [F/C]all that’s [G/C]forbidden [F/C]Every des[C]ire{,} and [Dm/C]sin I keep [C]hidden [F]Search me and [C/E]know me,{,} I [F]want to bring [G]to You A [F]life that is [C/E]holy,{,} and [Dm]sanctified [Gsus]through You[3/8 G]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 take all i am lord and all that i cling to you are my savior i owe everything to take all the treasures that lie in my storehouse they cannot follow when i enter your house chorus so i surrender all to you i surrender all verse 2 take all my cravings for vain recognition fleshly indulgence and worldly ambition i want so much lord to make you the focus to serve you in secret and never be noticed verse 3 take all my hunger for all thats forbidden every desire and sin i keep hidden search me and know me i want to bring to you a life that is holy and sanctified through you
